Hi there, 
We did a bit of work on object recognition using NEAT. You can f=
ind the details in the following paper:
Abul Hasanat, M.H.; Harun, S.Z.; Ra=
machandram, D.; Rajeswari, M.; , "Object Class Recognition Using NEAT-Evolv=
ed Artificial Neural Network," Computer Graphics, Imaging and Visualisation=
, 2008. CGIV '08. Fifth International Conference on , vol., no., pp.271-275=
, 26-28 Aug. 2008
URL: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?tp=3D&arn=
umber=3D4627018&isnumber=3D4626968

Regards,
Mozaherul Hoque

ahoogroups.com, "gmjally" <gmjally@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I am new to NEA=
T and my research focus is to use NEAT for Object Recognition in images. I =
am planning to use MATLAB code because basic images processing tasks can be=
 done easily. 
> Any suggestion or guidelines.
>  
> Besides that, I would =
like to know that how can i test the final and resultant neural network?
> =

> Thank you. 
> 
> G.M.Hassan
